title: Art Exhibition Layout Arrangement
description: Assist a participant in arranging six artworks on a exhibition grid layout with five positions. The task involves responding to curatorial insights, proposing balanced placements, and positioning artworks according to aesthetic cues provided by both participant and instructor.
